info.title: Dog API
info.description: A comprehensive API for managing dogs, breeds, adoption, health records, and training data

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of dogs with optional filtering

post.description: Add a new dog to the database

get.description: Retrieve a specific dog by its ID

delete.description: Remove a dog from the database

get.description: Get all photos for a specific dog
Retrieve a list of all available dog breeds with their characteristics
Retrieve detailed information about a specific dog breed
Search for dog breeds by name or partial name match
Retrieve a list of all available dog breed groups

200.description: List of breed groups with counts

get.description: Retrieve all adoption applications with optional status filtering

post.description: Submit a new adoption application for a dog

get.description: Retrieve a specific adoption application by ID

put.description: Update the status of an adoption application (approve, reject, etc.)

get.description: Retrieve dogs that are available for adoption (no approved applications)
Retrieve statistics about adoptions and applications
Retrieve health records with optional filtering by dog or record type

post.description: Add a new health record for a dog

get.description: Retrieve a specific health record by ID
Retrieve vaccination history for a specific dog
Retrieve a list of veterinarians and their clinics from health records
Retrieve training records with optional filtering

post.description: Add a new training record for a dog

get.description: Retrieve a specific training record by ID
Retrieve all training records and progress for a specific dog
Retrieve a list of trainers and their specialties
